thread.title: Thousands More A&P Workers Could Be Unemployed by Thanksgiving
thread.title_full: Thousands More A&P Workers Could Be Unemployed by Thanksgiving - WSJ

author: Peg Brickley
title: Thousands More A&P Workers Could Be Unemployed by Thanksgiving
text:
Disappointing results from a recent bankruptcy auction could mean another 6,000 workers will join the line of former Great Atlantic & Pacific Tea Co. Inc. employees at the unemployment office by Thanksgiving, court papers indicate.
That estimate is based on about 70 stores that went unsold, with an average of 80 jobs per store. It is in addition to the jobs lost when 25 stores were closed by the troubled chain, and an unknown number of jobs lost at stores being sold to buyers that wonâ€™t be operating grocery outlets....
